name: Basic (BAS6) Package for MODFLOW-2005
description: Defines the basic model parameters and boundary conditions, including active, inactive, and constant-head cells for the Barton Springs simulation.

name: Boundary Condition File for MODFLOW-2005
description: Specifies boundary condition parameters, including tolerances and head change limits, for the Barton Springs simulation.

name: Discretization (DIS) Package for MODFLOW-2005
description: Describes the model grid, including layers, rows, columns, and time steps, defining the spatial and temporal discretization for the Barton Springs simulation.

name: Drain (DRN) Package for MODFLOW-2005
description: Specifies drain locations and properties, simulating groundwater discharge to drains for the Barton Springs simulation.

name: Horizontal Flow Barrier (HFB6) Package for MODFLOW-2005
description: Defines horizontal flow barriers, representing features like faults or low-permeability zones within the Barton Springs simulation.

name: Output Control (OC) Package for MODFLOW-2005
description: Specifies the output controls, determining when and how simulation results are written for the Barton Springs simulation.

name: Recharge (RCH) Package for MODFLOW-2005
description: Defines spatially distributed recharge rates, representing inputs such as precipitation or infiltration for the Barton Springs simulation.

name: Strongly Implicit Procedure (SIP) Package for MODFLOW-2005
description: Specifies parameters for the Strongly Implicit Procedure numerical solver used in the Barton Springs simulation.

name: Well (WEL) Package for MODFLOW-2005
description: Defines well locations, layers, and pumping rates, specifying both extraction and injection wells for the Barton Springs simulation.
